subject: Re: RAM Equipment Website - Updates to ABOUT
preview: closed and responded in different ticket

full_threads.body: closed and responded in different ticket

Thanks Adriane, we're really happy with the gallery and have sent it live. Can you please add "GALLERY" to the drop down list, it can sit under the "CAPABILITY STATEMENT".

Also, can you please look at how the capability statement displays? It's currently very big and not easy for someone to read unless they manually zoom out significantly.

Kind regards,
Julie Haslam CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER

(Time: 10mins) - Draft for Gallery and Loom Video guide

Hi Xavier,

Just a quick note to let you know I’ve added the gallery page as a draft, so it’s ready for you to jump in and make any amendments once the images are finalized.

I’ve also recorded a quick Loom video to walk you through the setup—apologies, I mistakenly addressed it to Julie before realizing it was you who made the request!

Here’s the video: https://www.loom.com/share/b2fd61f60f204c9d852b2a135250f069?sid=b1832f2c-aa86-4220-a157-06799caed655

Let me know if there’s anything else you need—always happy to help!

Hi Adriane,

If you create the page and leave it as a draft, I can make the amendments and the masonry gallery when the images have been finalised.

If you could please let me know when this is complete, I will start adding images.

Kind regards,
Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING EXECUTIVE



P: 08 8210 4000 D: 08 8210 4013 E: Xavier@RAMEquipment.com.au A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033



Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.
(Time: 15mins) Heading style config + new page + new plugin configuration for PDF embed

Hey Julie,

Thanks so much for the update!

We've gone ahead and made the following changes:
  • Adjusted the font size of the OUR CORE VALUES heading so it's a little less overpowering
  • Moved the intro copy above the core values section, as requested
  • Added CAPABILITY STATEMENT under the ABOUT menu, with the attached PDF embedded

Feel free to take a look and let us know if there's anything you'd like tweaked further.

And no rush at all on the gallery images—just send them through whenever you’re ready. We’ll take care of the rest!

action.text: Workflow **Expert Plan tickets tag as urgent** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi Adriane,

Thanks for being so efficient!

Is it possible to reduce the font size of "OUR CORE VALUES" in the heading, it's very big. If not too tricky, could we please also have the intro copy sit above the core values? If not it's all good to leave as is.

Capability statement attached.

We will need some time to pull together our gallery images but I'll ask Xavs to pull together and we will supply to you as soon as possible.

Thanks!

Kind regards,
Julie Haslam CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER

(Time: 10mins) - adding new page + menu item alter

action.text: Workflow **Assign Expert Plan (AC - Apr 16)** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hey Julie,

Thanks so much for getting in touch with Wolf IQ Support!

Just a quick update—we’ve already made a few of the changes to the “ABOUT” section of your site:
  • Removed The RAM Difference and Product Guide pages from the menu
  • Added the Our Core Values page (with the JPEG and accompanying copy you provided)

It looks like the Capability Statement PDF didn’t come through—would you mind resending that? If there’s a preferred format, we’re happy to work with whatever’s easiest.

For the Gallery section, feel free to send through the images and any video links you’d like featured—we’ll make sure they’re showcased nicely.

The updates should already be live, but let us know if you spot anything off or if there’s anything else you’d like us to tweak. Always happy to help!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

We'd like to make some changes to the menu items / pages under the "ABOUT" section of our website.

List should be:

MEET OUR TEAM - remains as is
CAPABILITY STATEMENT - we'd like to add this. Perhaps viewers can flip through it somehow? I've attached a PDF but can provide in a different format if needed?
OUR CORE VALUES - JPEG attached. Accompanying copy: At RAM Equipment, our values guide everything we do. We're thankful for the trust our customers place in us, and we take responsibility for delivering the best outcomes every time. By sharing our knowledge and resources, we build stronger partnerships. Integrity underpins every decision, while enthusiasm drives us to go the extra mile. Above all, we act with purpose - making things easier, safer, and more rewarding for our customers and our team.
LATEST UPDATES - remains as is
CAREER OPPORTUNITIES - remains as is
GALLERY - we'd like to add a gallery section to display all of our best / hero images. Would ideally like to include some links to videos in this as well
FAQ - remains as is

We would like to remove these pages:
THE RAM DIFFERENCE
PRODUCT GUIDE

Thanks!

Kind regards,
Julie Haslam
 CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER
